message: it is normal to apply into more than 200 companies in Europe that you see their job posts match your skills  , and get replies from only 15  , they told you that your CV don't pass the initial  screening or they decided to continue with other candidates  ?

data.message: Work on your CV, they have nothing to gain by lying to you.
Show the important detail in you CV . try to share some examples of your projects , github. try to make it less and readable as possible and good luck

for many reasons:
CV - cover letter - visa sponsorship
- Take care of your cover letter and list your skills 
- Add you role in your team in every company 
- Try to make it like Linkedin but more formatted 
- some companies not providing visa sponsorship , unfortunately  you are from Um Eldonia :(
Can you share your CV and we could investigate it together?
most of them will tell you that your profile doesn't match to avoid telling u we can't sponsor your visa.. as they say this is equal opportunity but the truth it's not

Post everything into LinkedIn. Fill it up to the max. Then export your profile as PDF. Copy and paste in to  word file. 
Send to recruiters. Rinse repeat.
Been doing this for years. I no longer have  local copy :)

Also beware some recruiters only want to collect resumes to remove candidates from the market. So they can push their own .
